CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing OracleFeed relative to NovaStream?
SRP.A: OracleFeed is {below} NovaStream in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing NovaStream relative to OracleFeed?
SRP.A: NovaStream is {above} OracleFeed in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total subscription revenue?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {NovaStream}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total subscription revenue?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {OracleFeed}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is OracleFeed's minimum Subscription Revenue in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: OracleFeed's minimum Subscription Revenue is in {1993}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is OracleFeed's maximum Subscription Revenue in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: OracleFeed's maximum Subscription Revenue is in {2015}.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 2004, was the average total Subscription Revenue higher or lower than between 1995 and 2004?
NC.A: The average total subscription revenue between 1997 and 2004 was {higher} than between 1995 and 2004.

NC.Q: Was the total Subscription Revenue in 1996 higher or lower than in 2001?
NC.A: The total subscription revenue in 1996 was {lower} than in 2001.

NC.Q: Between 2011 and 2012, did the total Subscription Revenue experience a larger or smaller change than between 2002 and 2006?
NC.A: The change in total subscription revenue between 2011 and 2012 was {smaller} than between 2002 and 2006.

NC.Q: Was the total Subscription Revenue in 2001 higher or lower than in 2003?
NC.A: The total subscription revenue in 2001 was {higher} than in 2003.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {NovaStream} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did NovaStream and OracleFeed first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: NovaStream and OracleFeed first exchanged leading positions in {1994}.
